title: 04/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - 49ers, Bears, Rodgers, NFL Draft
itunes:title: 04/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - 49ers, Bears, Rodgers, NFL Draft
description:
The 49ers did the right thing drafting Trey Lance and keeping Jimmy Garoppolo

The Bears finally have a QB and hope

Aaron Rodgers showed how petty he really is

Colin discusses which draft picks he didn't like


Guest: Joe Thomas

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
